translations: v.（使）变松，（使）松开；放宽（限制、法律等）；使（关系）弱化，疏远；使（肠道）在排泄前畅通

phrs.translation: 放松肌肉；松弛；[口]信口开河；[口]慷慨解囊

sentences.sentence: Relax, smile; loosen up in mind and body.
He reached up to loosen the scarf around his neck.
sentences.translation: 他伸出手松开围在脖子上的围巾。

sentences.sentence: Many business groups have been pressing the Federal Reserve to loosen interest rates.
sentences.translation: 许多商业团体一直在施加压力要求联邦储备局放宽利率。
